name: Boingers
description:
Are you tired of nasty virus doing virus stuff? Well you are in luck, because Boingers is a first person antivirus simulator, where with your trusty cyber-bat you will be able to send those pesky virus flying far from your system!

... T-thats what an antivirus do, right?

Programmed by Fabricio Danza

art design, 3D modeling, textures, animation and trailer by Miguel Gomez mezgo196@gmail.com

Lighting and particles VFX by both

Sounds and music from free sources (bless free sources like freesound and incopetech).

Boingers was made in six months for our thesis, it was my first experience using Unity and I can say that I feel very proud with the result, also got lucky and worked for the first time with a great 3d artist.

Making games is tiring.

Making games is fun.
